definition: Pingchang county in Panzhihua 攀枝花[Pan1 zhi1 hua1], south Sichuan
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
Pingchang county in Panzhihua 攀枝花[Pan1 zhi1 hua1], south Sichuan

sentences.english: The cumulative amount of controlled soil and water loss area in Pingchang county, Sichuan province is 782.
sentences.chinese: 四川省平昌縣已累計治理水土流失面積782。

sentences.english: Pyeongchang in South Korea will host the 2018 Winter Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 韓國的平昌將主辦2018年冬季奧運會。

sentences.english: People look at a giant white tiger set up for the Daegwallyeong Snow Festival in Pyeongchang, South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 韓國平昌的冰雪節上，人們正在看着一尊虎冰雕。

sentences.english: The South Korean resort of Pyeongchang has been selected to host the 2018 Winter Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 已被選爲韓國的平昌度假申辦2018年冬季奧運會。

sentences.english: The 2018 winter Olympics were awarded to Pyeongchang in South Korea, which will be only the second Asian country to host the winter games.
sentences.chinese: 2018年冬季奧運會舉辦權授予韓國平昌。
